gov.nasa.gsfc.nisgs.dsm
Class Product

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.gsfc.nisgs.dsm.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Product>
public final class Product
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Product>

This class contains all information related to one product in the DSM database. Fields are optional except for the following:
start time, agent, product type
You must specify at least one resource for this product. See "addResource".
If you specify a subproduct table, you must provide any required arguments via "addAttribute."

Version:
1.0.1 Removed SimpleTimeFormat object and now use Utility to convert times., 1.1.0 Added versions of setCenter and setCorners with Number arguments., 1.1.1 Added setAgent(String) and changed the default agent string to "****". The Product(Product) constructor would throw an exception before these changes were made., 1.1.2 Added productType argument to Product(Product) constructor., 3.0.0 Added support for site-awareness. Added the creation date., 3.4 Added String getAttribute(String name), 3.12 Added Comparable interface.
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Product

public Product(java.util.Date start,
               java.util.Date stop,
               java.lang.String agent,
               java.lang.String productType,
               Pass pass)
Create a Product. This constructor has all fields that the database requires except resources. You must still use addResource to add at least one resource to the product.

Parameters:
start - The start date and time of the product.
stop - The stop (end) date and time of the product.
agent - This string identifies the program (or agent) who put this product in the database. Each agent should have a unique name. Agent names are used in debugging, and some programs use the agent name to retrieve all products they put into the database. By default, the agent name is "****".
productType - A product type for this product. It should match a name in the ProductTypes table.
pass - The pass associated with this product.

Product

public Product(Product product,
               java.lang.String productType)
        throws java.lang.Exception
Create a product based upon an existing one. The new product will have the same pass and start and stop times. The old product will automatically be registered as a contributing product to this one. The agent name will be "****" unless you change it.

Parameters:
product - The product used to construct this product.
productType - The productType for this new product. It should not be null.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
Method Detail

addResource

public void addResource(java.lang.String keyword,
                        java.lang.String path)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Add a resource to this product. You must specify at least one resource when you create a product, and no other product may share this resource.

Parameters:
keyword - A unique keyword within this product that is associated with this resource. Others use the keyword to fetch it.
path - The absolute path of the resource file.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                        java.lang.String description)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Add a resource to this product. You must specify at least one resource when you create a product, and no other product may share this resource.

Parameters:
keyword - A unique keyword within this product that is associated with this resource. Others use the keyword to fetch it.
path - The absolute path of the resource file.
description - A brief description of the resource. It may be null.

java.lang.Exception

addThumbnail

public void addThumbnail(java.lang.String path,
                         java.lang.String description)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
A product may have one or more thumbnails. A thumbnail may be a small image, or it may be other types provided a browser can understand the mime type and can conveniently display the thumbnail. Thumbnails are not required.

Parameters:
path - The absolute path of the thumbnail file.
description - A brief description of the thumbnail. May be null.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

A product may have one or more thumbnails. A thumbnail may be a small image, or it may be other types provided that a browser can understand the mime type and is able to conveniently display the thumbnail. Thumbnails are not required.

Parameters:
path - The absolute path of the thumbnail file.

java.lang.Exception

setDeleteProtected

public void setDeleteProtected(boolean deleteProtected)
Protect this product from being delete during routine cleanup. This method must be called prior to storing a product.

setSubproduct

public void setSubproduct(java.lang.String subproduct)
Set the name of a subproduct table, where more extensive information about this product exists. The subproduct name must match the name of a Products subtable in the database.

                  throws java.lang.Exception
Add an attribute to this product. Attributes are meaningful only if you specify a subproduct, and then each attribute name must match a field in the subproduct table.

java.lang.Exception

setAlgorithm

public void setAlgorithm(java.lang.String algorithm,
                         java.lang.String algorithmVersion)
Set an algorithm name and version number. There is no defined format for these strings, but you should be consistent within products so that it can be used as a search field. Do not set either field to null.

addContributingResource

public void addContributingResource(java.lang.String path,
                                    java.lang.String description)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Add a contributing resource to this product. A contributing resource is one that was used in the creation of this product, but it is not a product itself in this database. A contributing resource is optional. The path may reference a resource that does not exist. It is not an error to add a resource multiple times - extras are ignored.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

addContributingProduct

public void addContributingProduct(Product product)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Add a contributing product to this product. A contributing product is one that was directly used in the creation of this product, and it is also a product itself in this database. You are not required to identify contributing products. Note that a contributing product must have been previously inserted into the database. (It must have a product ID.)

Parameters:
product - A product directly used to create this product.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

addContributingProduct

public void addContributingProduct(java.lang.String productId)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
Add a contributing product to this product. A contributing product is one that was directly used in the creation of this product, and it is also a product itself in this database. It is optional. It is not an error to add a product multiple times - extras are ignored.

Parameters:
productId - A product (by ID) directly used to create this product.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

name - A unique attribute name. Case is significant.
